text: The Los Angeles Clippers are an American professional basketball team in the National Basketball Association (NBA). The Clippers play home games in the Intuit Dome in the Los Angeles suburb of Inglewood, California, which opened for the 2024â€“25 season. This followed 25 seasons of sharing Crypto.com Arena in downtown Los Angeles with the Los Angeles Lakers. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:National Basketball Association teams Category:Sports in Los Angeles Category:1970 establishments in California
title: Los Angeles Clippers
